/* This example requires Tailwind CSS v2.0+ This example requires some changes to your config: ``` // tailwind.config.js module.exports = { // ... plugins: [ // ... require('@tailwindcss/aspect-ratio'), ], } ``` */ import { Fragment, useState, useRef } from 'react' import { Dialog, Popover, Tab, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { MenuIcon, SearchIcon, ShoppingBagIcon, XIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' //components import Scrollspy from 'react-scrollspy'; import {ModalResume} from '../components/Modal'; //icons import {FaGithub, FaLinkedin, FaFile} from 'react-icons/fa'; const navigation = { categories: [ { id: 'aboutMe', name: 'About Me', href: '#aboutMe', featured: [ { name: 'New Arrivals', href: '#Projects', imageSrc: 'https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/mega-menu-category-01.jpg', imageAlt: 'Models sitting back to back, wearing Basic Tee in black and bone.', }, { name: 'Basic Tees', href: '#Projects', imageSrc: 'https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/mega-menu-category-02.jpg', imageAlt: 'Close up of Basic Tee fall bundle with off-white, ochre, olive, and black tees.', }, ], }, { id: 'projects', name: 'Projects', href: '#Projects', featured: [ ], }, { id: 'skills', name: 'Languages', href: '#Skills', featured: [ ], }, { id: 'contact', name: 'Contact', href: '#Contact', featured: [ ], }, ], pages: [ { name: 'About Me', href: '#AboutMe' }, { name: 'Projects', href: '#Projects' }, { name: 'Languages', href: '#Skills' }, { name: 'Contact', href: '#Contact' }, ], } function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function Example() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const ref = useRef(null); const handleClick = () => { ref.current.openModal(); } return (
